content: घटक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [घटयति घट्-णिच् ण्वुल्] {@--1@} Exerting oneself, striving for; एते सत्पुरुषाः परार्थघटकाः स्वार्थं परित्यज्य ये <ls>Bh. 2. 74.</ls> {@--2@} Bringing about, accomplishing. {@--3@} Forming a constituent part, constituent, component. --कः {@--1@} A tree that produces fruit without apparent flowers. {@--2@} A match-maker, an agent who ascertains genealogies and negotiates matrimonial alliances. {@--3@} A genealogist.
